derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin magnas, magnat- 'great man', from Latin magnus 'great'

entry.tran: 大企业家;实业巨头;大亨
entry.def: A magnate is someone who has earned a lot of money from a particular business or industry.

means.word_mean: 1. a very wealthy or powerful businessman;
